title: Manage High-Pressure Autoclave
description: An operator at a gold processing plant manages a high-pressure, high-temperature autoclave used for pressure oxidation (POX) of refractory ores.

tasks.description: Monitor the key operating parameters of the autoclave: temperature, pressure, and oxygen level.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator confirms that the autoclave is running stably within its safe operating envelope.

tasks.description: Review the lab results for the autoclave discharge to check the sulfide oxidation rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Lab results show that the oxidation rate is 98%, meeting the target for good gold recovery downstream.

tasks.description: Make a small adjustment to the oxygen injection rate to optimize performance and reduce operating costs.
tasks.expected_outcome: The oxygen flow is slightly trimmed without affecting oxidation performance.
